item.title: “Leave It to Beaver” and “The Twilight Zone” Child Actor John Eimen Dies at 76
item.description: Eimen made his TV debut in 1957 as Theodore Cleaver's classmate in the premiere episode of 'Leave It to Beaver'

item.title: Macaulay Culkin Reveals 'Idea' for “Home Alone ”Sequel with Kevin Facing Off Against His Son: 'He's the One Setting Traps'
